NakedPoppy Revitalize Organic Facial Oil

Brand: NakedPoppy

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Rosa Rubiginosa Seed Oil*, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil*, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil*, Citrus Bergamia (Bergamot) Peel Oil*, Papaver Somniferum Seed Oil*, Tocopherol *Certified organic

Directions: Apply 3-5 drops onto freshly

5 drops onto freshly cleansed, damp skin morning and night

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
